Text: Just spent 2 hours driving a car and listening "Alchemy". What a wonderful live record it is; going to rip it tonite.

So, graknor!
Do you still live in the 80's?
Or do you love the sound of crunching from vinyl?
Have you heard that we have CD nowdays?
If you really LOVE this album, you will LOVE LOVE LOVE it on CD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Yes, bhere4u, of course I am living in the 80's.  I mean, how else would I be able to go onto the internet, and upload my torrents?  And since these files were ripped from a CD*, that must also mean that I've heard of those.

*the Compact Disc, or CD, was invented in the 1980s.
